headline: Crawford & Company names Bruce Swain as Interim President & CEO
synthesis: This ties into broader market movement and sentiment.

timeline.text: The appointment of Bruce Swain as Interim President & CEO may signal a strategic shift within Crawford & Company amidst evolving market dynamics. Such leadership changes often reflect a company's response to challenges or opportunities in the industry. Stakeholders will likely be keen to observe how this decision impacts overall performance and investor confidence.
